name: Cyber Cycle
description:
CyberCycle is a low-poly cyberpunk racing game focusing on the aspects of speed and pursuit

Featured game modes:

Search & Scan:

Race against the clock as you try to find and disable a ticking bomb located in a truck roaming around the city

Split-screen Race:

Race against your friend in the world of cyber cycle

Split-screen Pursuit:

The cop (player 1) has to chase down and disable the crook's bike while the crook (player 2) has to stay alive until time runs out
